channel.title: The Conservative Way - The Brian Edition
channel.itunes:subtitle: "One of the most analytical minds of Conservative Talk Radio on the internet"
channel.itunes:author: The Conservative Way - The Brian Edition

item.title: The Conservative Way - The Brian Edition 21
item.description: In this episode I talk about the facade that the Democrats put up to disguise the truth of who they really are. They hide behind a mask of deception and disguise their true intentions and beliefs by using conservative language in order to deceive a nation of people who still believe in the Constitution and the founding principles. But make no mistake...they are in fact Marxists and Socialists and I present several audio clips to show the true face of the Democrats and what they really are.
item.dc:creator: The Conservative Way - The Brian Edition
